Episodes.Title: Treasure Hunt
Episodes.Plot: Little Nutbrown Hare and his friends go on a hunt for treasure in the meadow to collect all kinds of unique gems, like flowers, feathers, apples and egg-shells, for Big Nutbrown Hare.

Episodes.Title: March Like An Ant
Episodes.Plot: Little Nutbrown Hare is disappointed when a trail of ants disappears with the delicious Spring berries he's found.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Blue Wonder
Episodes.Plot: The summer meadow is home to many amazing treasures of nature. When Little Nutbrown Hare finds a beautiful blue butterfly, he and Little Field Mouse go on a hunt for other blue treasures to bring back.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: No Place Like Home
Episodes.Plot: Little Nutbrown Hare wakes early one summer morning before the sun has risen. Big Nutbrown Hare sends Little Nutbrown Hare off to invite his friends for breakfast so that he can rest a little longer. Along the way, Little Nutbrown Hare discovers how wonderful and different all his friends' homes are.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Favourite Thing
Episodes.Plot: One summer's day Little Field Mouse is very excited to show Little Nutbrown Hare a very pretty flower! She lets Little Nutbrown Hare borrow it but when it blows away Little Nutbrown Hare worries how his friend will react.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
